original_text: “If a man sins against his neighbor and is made to take an oath and comes and swears his oath before your altar in this house,
korean_text: 만일 어떤 사람이 그 이웃에게 범죄함으로 맹세시킴을 받고 그가 와서 이 성전에 있는 주의 제단 앞에서 맹세하거든

sentences.original_text: If a man sins against his neighbor
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 사람이 그 이웃에게 죄를 짓고

sentences.original_text: and is made to take an oath
and comes and swears his oath
